translation.en: -[narrator] Roly? -[leaves rustling] Isn't it time for…
Huh! Duggee!
[all] Duggee!
[narrator] Duggee!
[all] Duggee!
[Squirrels] Hey Duggee!
[narrator] Duggee and the Being Quiet Badge.
[narrator] Time to give the barn its yearly clear-out, Duggee?
translation.zh: 年度谷仓大扫除时间到了对吧 道奇？

translation.en: [narrator] Maybe tackle it next year… Huh! Woof!
-[Betty] What's that? -Huh?
[narrator] That looks like your…
Great Grandmother's journal!
This is a very exciting discovery!
translation.zh: 这真是一项令人兴奋的发现啊

translation.en: -[Squirrels] Why? -Woof.
[narrator] You see…
Duggee's Great Grandmama was a famous explorer!
translation.zh: 道奇的曾祖母是一位有名的探险家

translation.en: She had many wonderful adventures.
translation.zh: 她经历过许多美好的冒险旅程

translation.en: [Tag] What's she doing there?
[narrator] She was trying to spot a Snard.
What's a Snard?
[narrator] It's a very shy creature.
translation.zh: 那是一种非常害羞的生物

translation.en: [narrator] Over the years, people drew what they thought the Snard looked like,
translation.zh: 多年来 人们画出心中史纳德的模样

translation.en: but no one has ever seen it properly.
translation.zh: 但从来没有人亲眼看过

translation.en: -Why? -[narrator] Because Roly, it very rarely comes out.
translation.zh: -为什么？-罗利 因为它很少出现

translation.en: And it doesn't like noise.
Did Great Grandmama see the Snard?
translation.zh: 曾祖母见到过史纳德吗？

translation.en: [narrator] Well, she writes here…
[Great Grandmama] Immense excitement!
Have found some rather large footprints that I believe belong to the Snard!
translation.zh: 我发现了一些超巨大脚印我相信是史纳德留下来的

translation.en: Have managed to fund an expedition to track the Snard,
translation.zh: 我踏上寻找史纳德之旅

translation.en: which I have been doing over many, many miles.
Finally, a clue! A small tuft of colorful fur!
translation.zh: 终于有了线索 一小块彩色毛皮

translation.en: Then at last, there it was. The Snard!
translation.zh: 然后总算被我找到了史纳德

translation.en: However, to my eternal regret,
-I got a small case of the snuffles. -[sneezing]
Tragically, it was enough to scare away the elusive creature.
translation.zh: 不幸的是那个喷嚏吓跑了这个难以捉摸的生物

translation.en: My message to future Snard spotters is…
translation.zh: 我对未来史纳德猎人的建议是…

translation.en: [whispering] Be quiet.
[Norrie] Can we look for the Snard?
translation.zh: 我们可以去找史纳德吗？

translation.en: -[Squirrels] Yay! -[whispering] Ah, woof.
[narrator] Remember, Squirrels.
The key to spotting a Snard is to be quiet.
translation.zh: 找到史纳德的关键就是安静

translation.en: Okay!
-[alarm dings] -[narrator] Luckily, Duggee has his Being Quiet Badge!
translation.zh: 幸好道奇有他的安静徽章

translation.en: He can show you the basics. [whispering] Observe.
translation.zh: 他可以示范给你们看 看好啦

translation.en: Do you see? Duggee was going to speak, but he stopped himself
translation.zh: 看到了吗？道奇本来想说话 但是他停了下来

translation.en: because he's being quiet. Now you try.
translation.zh: 因为他要保持安静 换你们试试看

translation.en: -Tag? -Yes?
-See what Duggee did there, Tag? -Oh, yeah!
translation.zh: -你看到道奇的示范了吗 泰格？-看到了

translation.en: Jolly good!
-[narrator] Now, everyone else. -[pops]
Excellent! Look!
Duggee is saying he's pleased that you're all being quiet.
translation.zh: 道奇说他很高兴你们都很安静

translation.en: Can you say things while being quiet?
translation.zh: 你们安静时也能说话吗？

translation.en: You're saying you're cold!
You're saying you're warm!
You're excited!
I think… you're thinking!
And you're going to be quiet.
Are we ready to go Snard Spotting?
translation.zh: 准备好要去找史纳德了吗？

translation.en: -B-- -[shushing]
[narrator, whispering] This is where your Great Grandmama last saw the Snard!
translation.zh: 这是你曾祖母最后一次看到史纳德的地方

translation.en: [narrator] Oh…Sounds like everyone's hungry.
Did you bring some of your homemade pineapple bread, Duggee?
translation.zh: 你带了一些自制的菠萝面包吗道奇？

translation.en: [narrator] Oh, my! It's the Snard!
I think someone else is hungry, Squirrels!
translation.zh: 看来有人饿了 松鼠们

translation.en: [narrator, whispering] Remember to stay quiet, Squirrels.
translation.zh: 记得保持安静 松鼠们

translation.en: -We don't want to scare it aw-- -[growls, munches]
[Norrie] We found the Snard.
I'm sorry, Norrie?
We found the Snard!
[narrator, speaking loudly] Yes! -Great Grandmama would be very pleased! -[growling]
translation.zh: 是啊 曾祖母一定会很开心

translation.en: -Wouldn't she, Duggee? -[barking]
translation.zh: 你说对不对啊 道奇？

translation.en: [narrator, speaking loudly] Well done, Squirrels.
You've earned your Being Quiet Badge!
-[Squirrels] Yay! -[honking]
-Ah, and here are your parents. -[bell rings]
Just time for one more thing.
[Squirrels] Duggee hug!
[Tag] Duggee hug!
[Squirrels] We got our… [whispering] Being Quiet Badges!
[Tag] And we spotted the Snard! Look!
translation.zh: 我们还看到史纳德了 你们看

translation.en: Of course you saw the Snard. Yes. Totally.
translation.zh: -你们当然看到史纳德了-是啊 我们相信

translation.en: -[honking] -Bye-bye, everybody!
Well that was fun. Wasn't it, Duggee?
translation.zh: 今天真开心 对吧 道奇？

translation.en: [Squirrels] Hey Duggee!
